item.title: testing the new theme
item.description: This is to test the new theme and see whether plots are properly rendered. library(tidyverse, quietly = T) ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------------------------------------------ tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.2.1.9000 v purrr 0.3.2 ## v tibble 2.1.3 v dplyr 0.8.3 ## v tidyr 1.0.0 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.3.1 v forcats 0.4.0 ## -- Conflicts --------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() mtcars %>% ggplot()+ geom_boxplot(aes(x=as.
